**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 264 1.1 **Bloodline** [Hag](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=26) **Area** 30-foot-radius emanation **Defense** Will --- You briefly transform your features into the horrific visage of a hag, striking fear into your enemies. Foes in the area must attempt a Will save. **Success** The foe is unaffected.
**Failure** The foe is [frightened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=76).
**Critical Failure** The foe is frightened 2. --- **Heightened (5th)** Foes in the area are frightened 1 on a success, frightened 2 on a failure, and frightened 3 and fleeing for 1 round on a critical failure. They are still unaffected on a critical success.
name: Horrific Visage
